languages.text: "Ты знаешь, что я убила Леди Теодору, но я не вижу упрека в твоем взгляде. Почему?"
"You know that I killed Lady Theodora, but I see no reproach in your gaze — why?"
languages.original_text: "Ты знаешь, что я убила Леди Теодору, но я не вижу упрека в твоем взгляде. Почему?"

traits.locale_text: "You know that I killed Lady Theodora, but I see no reproach in your gaze — why?"
"You know that I killed Lady Theodora, but I see no reproach in your gaze — why?"
"You know that I killed Lady Theodora, but I see no reproach in your gaze — why?"
"You know that I killed Lady Theodora, but I see no reproach in your gaze — why?"
"You know that I killed Lady Theodora, but I see no reproach in your gaze — why?"

languages.text: "Ihr wisst, dass ich Lady Theodora getötet habe, doch ich sehe in Eurem Blick keinen Tadel. Warum nicht?"
languages.original_text: "You know that I killed Lady Theodora, but I see no reproach in your gaze — why?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wisst, dass ich Lady Theodora getötet habe, doch ich sehe in Eurem Blick keinen Tadel. Warum nicht?"

languages.text: « Vous savez que j'ai tué dame Théodora, mais je ne décèle pas le moindre reproche dans votre regard... Pourquoi ? »
languages.original_text: "You know that I killed Lady Theodora, but I see no reproach in your gaze — why?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez que j'ai tué dame Théodora, mais je ne décèle pas le moindre reproche dans votre regard... Pourquoi ? »

languages.text: «Sabe que maté a lady Theodora, pero no veo reproche alguno en su mirada. ¿Por qué?».
languages.original_text: "You know that I killed Lady Theodora, but I see no reproach in your gaze — why?"

traits.locale_text: «Sabe que maté a lady Theodora, pero no veo reproche alguno en su mirada. ¿Por qué?».

languages.text: 「私がシオドーラ様を殺したのだと、知っているの？でも、あなたの目には非難の色は見えない…なぜ？」
languages.original_text: "You know that I killed Lady Theodora, but I see no reproach in your gaze — why?"

traits.locale_text: 「私がシオドーラ様を殺したのだと、知っているの？でも、あなたの目には非難の色は見えない…なぜ？」

languages.text: “你明明知道是我杀害了西奥多拉夫人，但你的目光却没有丝毫责备之意，这是为什么？”
languages.original_text: "You know that I killed Lady Theodora, but I see no reproach in your gaze — why?"

traits.locale_text: “你明明知道是我杀害了西奥多拉夫人，但你的目光却没有丝毫责备之意，这是为什么？”

languages.original_text: "You know that I killed Lady Theodora, but I see no reproach in your gaze — why?"

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora'nın ölümüne sebep olduğumu biliyorsun. Yine de bakışlarında sitem görmüyorum. Neden?"
languages.original_text: "You know that I killed Lady Theodora, but I see no reproach in your gaze — why?"
